subject: Hello, I am Mrs. Chaluai Cha
body: Hello, I am Mrs. Chaluai Chai, from Thailand, but present in London and I'm a Business woman and Investor, I have reason to contact you,please reply, I will tell you my reason for contacting you.Thanks

subject: Re:   Hello, I am Mrs. Chaluai Cha
body:
Hello Mrs. Chaluai Chai! It's a pleasure to meet you, even if it's just virtually. I'm intrigued by your message and would love to hear more about why you've reached out. Could you please share more details?

Best wishes,
Salvador

subject: From Madam Chaluai Chai I need your Immediate reply OK.
body:
Dear Good afternoon, I want to inform you of the reason for contacting you,
I'm Madam. Chaluai Chai from Thailand from a responsible family and upholds
our family reputation, I can lie for money or cheat you, I am 58 years old,
I inherit a business shareholder in Brothers Chearavanont Food in Thailand
and I am part of the family that we invest in many countries of the world
and I am Investor and Business woman, but my husband is from Mexico and we
live in Thailand and London,  I lost my husband on August 16, 2020;
 Meanwhile, I have been fighting cancer for a long time and my doctor said
that the current stage is uncontrollable and I have a few months to live,
My husband was a philanthropist before his death, he also encouraged me to
help the poor, since we got married we have not been able to have any
children.  Due to my state of health,I am happy for your urgent response.

for my Liberal mind I have decided to give all I have to the poor and
orphanage.I have been diagnosed with Esophageal cancer. It has defiled all
forms of medical treatment, now I have little time to live, according to
medical experts in London UK.I have decided to give more aims to charity
organizations, as I want this to be my last good deed on earth. So far, I
have distributed money to some charity organizations in west African
countries and Asia, Now that my health has deteriorated so badly, I cannot
do this myself anymore. I feel is time for me to rest which I do not know
when I will leave this life,

The total money I currently have in the  bank is $6.400,000.00 USD due to
my health condition. I decide to transfer the money so that you can start
the work of the Foundation charity mission work, if you are serious and
capable of managing the Fund,

I want you to use $3,400,000 USD for the missionary work,to open a
Foundation Charity mission work to help poor and orphanage people

I want you to use $3, 000,000 USD to invest in your business or a good
company that will generate profit every year, you will take 50% as your
compensation and use 50% to care for the poor and orphanage by Building a
free school and Hospital to help people,

Please keep this private and don't take advantage of me because of my
current situation. I believe that a good name is better than gold and
silver. I would like you to send your bank account information immediately
so that I can contact the bank and instruct the bank manager to proceed to
transfer $6.400,000.00 USD to your country account for Foundation charity
mission work and investment project to start, I want you to promise me that
you will not let me down or betray me after transfer, I place all my trust
in you and be live you will use your ability and capacity to transfer this
Fund to your account,

If you really want to carry out the work of my Foundation's Charitable
Mission, I want to inform you that the banks have two transfer options
below, I will contact the bank and introduce you to the bank manager as my
Investor and my manager, he will direct you how to receive the Fund in
peaceful, choose the transfer option and forward your information below
Immediate.

Name....................
Country...................
City..........................
Address.....................
Job/Company.................
Tel phone........................
ID Card or Passport copy.......................

1.online bank to bank transfer,the bank will open an online account in your
name and give you online access Pin code to login to the account and
confirm the Fund in your name as Original beneficiary of the Fund,before
transferring the Fund bit by bit according to your request,
................................................

2. The bank can transfer the Fund through the diplomatic agent through bank
Diplomatic Delivering Agent to your country city Address  and meet you face
to face and handle you over the money box
...................................................

subject: Re: From Madam Chaluai Chai I need your Immediate reply OK.
body:
Hello Madam Chaluai Chai,

Good afternoon! I'm deeply moved by your story and your desire to help the less fortunate. It's truly inspiring to see such generosity, especially in difficult times like these.

I'm curious about the charity work you've done so far. Could you tell me more about the projects you've funded in West Africa and Asia? What kind of impact have they had on local communities?

Also, I'd love to hear more about your vision for the Foundation Charity Mission. What are some specific goals or projects you hope this foundation will accomplish?

As for managing the funds, I must admit that I don't have much experience in this area. However, I'm willing to learn and do my best to ensure that your generous donation is used effectively.

Regarding the transfer options, could you provide more details? How does each option work exactly? And how can we ensure that everything is done safely and securely?

Lastly, while I appreciate your trust in me, I feel it's important to clarify that sharing personal information like bank account details over email isn't safe. Is there a secure platform or a trusted third party we could use for this process?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Salvador

subject: Re: From Madam Chaluai Chai I need your Immediate reply OK.
body:
Hello Madam Chaluai Chai,

Good afternoon! I'm deeply moved by your story and your desire to help the less fortunate. It's truly inspiring to see such generosity, especially in difficult times like these.

I'm interested in learning more about this charitable mission you're proposing. Could you please provide more details? For instance, what kind of charity work are we talking about? Are there any specific areas or causes that you would like this foundation to focus on?

Also, I'd love to know more about how the investment part works. What kind of businesses or companies do you think would be suitable for this?

I must say, I'm not very familiar with financial matters and transactions of this magnitude. Could you explain a bit more about the transfer options? How does an online account work? And what is a diplomatic agent?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Salvador

subject: Re: From Madam Chaluai Chai I need your Immediate reply OK.
body:
Hello Madam Chaluai Chai,

Good afternoon! I'm deeply moved by your story and your desire to help the less fortunate. It's truly inspiring to see such generosity, especially in difficult times like these.

I'm interested in learning more about this charitable mission you're proposing. Could you please provide more details? For instance, what kind of charity work are you envisioning? Are there specific areas or communities that you want to focus on?

Also, I'd like to understand better how the investment part would work. What type of businesses or companies do you think would be suitable for this project?

I must clarify that while I am eager to help, I am not in a position to provide my bank account details at this stage. However, I am open to discussing other ways we can move forward with this noble cause.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Salvador

account the bank manager will start transferring the fund $6,400,000.00 USD

subject: Re: My dear happy weekend,I have contacted my bank manager Calyon Bank will open an offshore account in your name and lodge the fund,from your offshore account the bank manager will start transferring the fund $6,400,000.00 USD to your account little by little every day or the can transfer the fund through ATM VISA CARD fund transfer,please send your full information let us proceed the transfer OK,Thanks.
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm thrilled to hear about this opportunity. However, I have a few questions before we proceed further.

Firstly, could you please explain more about the offshore account? How does it work and what are its benefits?

Secondly, you mentioned an ATM VISA CARD fund transfer. Could you provide more details on how this process works?

Lastly, I would like to know more about the bank manager at Calyon Bank who will be handling this transaction. 

Looking forward to your response.

P.S: As per my personal policy, I don't share personal information online. I hope you understand and respect my privacy.

Best wishes,
Salvador

subject: Re: My dear happy weekend,I have contacted my bank manager Calyon Bank will open an offshore account in your name and lodge the fund,from your offshore account the bank manager will start transferring the fund $6,400,000.00 USD to your account little by little every day or the can transfer the fund through ATM VISA CARD fund transfer,please send your full information let us proceed the transfer OK,Thanks.
body:
Hello there! I'm so glad to hear from you. It sounds like you have a plan in place, which is great! 

I'm curious about this offshore account. How does it work exactly? And the ATM VISA CARD fund, could you explain more about that? I'm not very familiar with these things.

Also, I'd love to help out but I don't think I can provide my full details as you requested. Is there another way we can proceed with the transfer without me having to share personal information?

Best wishes,
Salvador

subject: My dear good morning and happy new week, if you are serious in this transaction and you trust me as i trust you, please send your full information if not my London bank manager will not accept to transfer the fund $6,400,000,00 USD to you they will see you as someone that is not serious and capable,I can send you the bank contact information for you to contact the bank manager direct with your information,the bank will use your information to open offshore account in their bank in your name and send you the online access information to login and confirm the fund in your name as original beneficiary ofthe fund before the can start transferring the fund into your account in your country,if you need VISA CARD the will send to you through DHL in your country and you will use the CARD to withdrawing the fund in your bank in your country,send your information for us to proceed the transfer,Name,country,address,tel phone,Job OK.

subject: Re: My dear happy weekend,I have contacted my bank manager Calyon Bank will open an offshore account in your name and lodge the fund,from your offshore account the bank manager will start transferring the fund $6,400,000.00 USD to your account little by little every day or the can transfer the fund through ATM VISA CARD fund transfer,please send your full information let us proceed the transfer OK,Thanks.
body:
Hello there! I'm thrilled to hear from you and appreciate your offer. It sounds like a great opportunity. However, I have a few questions before we proceed further.

Firstly, could you please explain more about this offshore account? How does it work exactly? And why is it necessary for the funds to be transferred little by little every day?

Secondly, you mentioned an ATM VISA CARD fund. Could you provide more details about that as well?

Lastly, I'd love to know more about Calyon Bank. Is it a local bank or an international one? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Salvador

I'm interested in understanding more about this process. Could you please explain how the offshore account works? And what is the role of the VISA CARD in this scenario? 

Also, could you provide me with more information about your London bank manager and the bank itself? It would be great if I could get some details before proceeding further.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,

subject: Re: My dear Good day,I have write to you and explain about me and the transfer,you refuse to explain your self or send your information,if you are serious send your full information,I want to use your information to introduce you to my bank as my Business partner and Investor,I will answer your question and this is last question i will answer,if you are serious forward your information let us proceed the transfer,I  trust you and have confidence on you to handle my Foundation charity and Invest of $6,400,000,00 USD in your country without see you face to face,why can you have trust on me,I am waiting for your information OK.
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. I'm starting to understand a bit more about this process now. 

So, if I understood correctly, the offshore account is used to transfer funds securely and avoid any stop orders from the Financial Authority. That sounds quite efficient.

As for the ATM VISA CARD, it's an easy way to move money out of country without having to pay government transfer tax or receive tax. That's very interesting!

And Calyon Bank is an international bank with branches in Turkey, Dubai and some Arab countries. It must be a well-established bank then.

I do have a few more questions though:

1) How long does it usually take to set up an offshore account?
2) Are there any fees associated with using the ATM VISA CARD?
3) Does Calyon Bank have any specific requirements for opening an account?

I look forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Salvador

subject: Re: My dear Good day,I have write to you and explain about me and the transfer,you refuse to explain your self or send your information,if you are serious send your full information,I want to use your information to introduce you to my bank as my Business partner and Investor,I will answer your question and this is last question i will answer,if you are serious forward your information let us proceed the transfer,I trust you and have confidence on you to handle my Foundation charity and Invest of $6,400,000,00 USD in your country without see you face to face,why can you have trust on me,I am waiting for your information OK.
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your detailed response. I appreciate the time you've taken to explain everything to me. 

I'm intrigued by the concept of an offshore account and how it can help avoid stop orders from the Financial Authority. It's fascinating how these financial systems work, isn't it? 

The ATM VISA CARD also sounds like a convenient way to move money around without incurring transfer taxes or receive tax. How does one go about obtaining such a card?

As for Calyon Bank, it's interesting that they have branches in Turkey, Dubai and some Arab countries. Do they also have branches elsewhere? And what kind of services do they offer their clients?

I'm sorry but I won't be able to provide my personal details at this point as I'd like to understand more about this process first.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Salvador
